department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
short_summary: Contract Opportunity for Domestic IT Service Delivery and Support
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is looking for a service provider to deliver and support IT services for its domestic operations. The contract will be for a period of one year with two option periods of one year each. The procurement category is service and the procurement method is competitive selective tendering.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** TBIPS - Domestic IT Service Delivery and Support Optimization for the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development

**Reference Number:** 24-241990

**Solicitation Number:** cb-307-38276076

**Closing Date:** November 20, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Time

**Classification:**
The subject tender is classified under the following UNSPSC categories:

* 80101507: Information technology consultation services
* 80161604: Information technology IT management services
* 81160000: Information Technology Service Delivery

**Estimated Effort:** Up to one year for the initial contract period

**Contract Duration:** Initial contract period of one (1) year with two (2) option periods of one (1) year each.

**Tender Overview:**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a provider to deliver and support IT services for the Domestic IT Service Delivery and Support Optimization Program. The program aims to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of IT service delivery by transforming the service support and delivery model into the next generation.

**Key Requirements:**

* Provide information technology consultation services to support the evolution and maturity of the service support and delivery model
* Develop and implement a service support and delivery optimization roadmap to enhance IT service delivery capabilities
* Improve the department's IT service support and delivery model to be more client-centric, agile, and integrated in business solution development

**Security Requirements:**

* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Secret
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Secret

**Contract Authority:**
Contracting Authority: Deeptee Seebun
Contact Information: Deeptee.Seebun@international.gc.ca, (613) 791-7571

**Inquiries:**
Inquiries regarding this tender should be submitted to the Contracting Authority named above. The tender documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

Note: The TBIPS Method of Supply is refreshed three times per year. For more information on how to become a Qualified SA Holder, please contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca.
